body.name: Sweet Home Collection Rocking Chair Cushion Premium Tufted Pads Non Skid Slip Backed Set of Upper and Lower with Ties, 1 Count (Pack of 1), Velvet Mint

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Sweet Home Collection Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 19 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 100% Poly Fiber Fill/Pvc Non Slip Backing

PERFECT FIT FOR YOUR CHAIR - This set has two cushions, one u shaped rounded square (bottom) cushion and one rectangle (upper). The upper measures 21" x 17" and the lower measures 17" x 17". These dimensions are a perfect fit for almost all rocking chairs for your living room, play room, bedroom, baby nursery and even outdoor patio chairs (we do not recommend leaving these chair pads outside, but may be used on outdoor chairs and brought in when done).

TIE-LESS SKID-PROOF BACKING - We understand the frustration caused by chair pads when they don't stay in place. One of the most important qualities of a chair cushion is the ability to stay in place with frequent usage. Through research and development, we have designed the best way to keep our chair pads stuck to your chairs like glue (without the glue) - where they belong. Note: Upper cushion utilizes ties to stay in place

SPOIL YOURSELF - Over the years we have experimented different constructions and listened to your feedback and created a chair pad that is so soft and pleasant; a must have for all of your chairs. These cushions contain a generous fiber fill which create a gap of comfort between you and your hard wooden chair.

DELIGHTFUL LOOK VERSATILE DESIGN - The cover of these cushions utilize a tufted design that is a perfect fit for any decor. The tufted design is stylish and unique which looks beautiful on any chair. Conveniently available in over 10 colors and with velvet fabric, choose one to match your chair directly, or another color to accent the chair.

DURABLE, LONG LASTING, EASY TO CARE - To us, every stitch matters. We want you to be sitting on Sweet Home Collection Tufted Rocking Chair Cushions for chairs and chairs to come! Strength and durability and built into every inch. To top it all off, these cushions are MACHINE WASHABLE! Machine wash cold, do not bleach, do not iron, just tumble dry with no heat and your chair cushions will look as good as new. Sit with comfort and relaxation, sit with Sweet Home Collection.
body.description: Sitting on a hard wooden rocking chair is just uncomfortable. No need to suffer through another day shuffling around in your seat to find a soft spot. Toss these great-looking cushions on your rocking chairs for a quick way to soften up the place. Select the color option that suits your decor best, or start a whole new look with these as the catalyst. At this price, you can't go wrong! trust us, your bottom will thank you. Now available in 4 colors.

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: Machine Wash Cold. Do not bleach. Do not iron. Tumble dry no heat

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About us Our mission is simple: to help you create the bedroom and bathroom of your dreams with the high quality bed and bath accessories. That was our focus when we opened our family-owned business in 1995, and it remains our top priority today. Our unwavering commitment to quality starts at the very beginning, when our products are made. Since we manufacture nearly everything we sell, we’re able to insist on using only the best designs and materials. And since we’ve cut out the middle man, we can accommodate retail and wholesale customers, domestic and international orders -- all while keeping prices reasonable. Our unmatched selection also sets us apart from others. Whether you’re shopping for luxury bedding and alternative down comforters or designer shower curtains and bath rugs, we’ve got you covered. Our large inventory is constantly growing, so we have something to fit every sense of style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality rocking chair pad.
reviews.reviewText: Love, Love,Love this rocking chair pad. Very neat looking and soft. It stays in place. No slipping or sliding. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars So-so product but not as described
reviews.reviewText: Definitely not as described, the color was very much misleading in the description verses in person. They are not as full and fluffed as the pictures portray.Item was returned almost 3 weeks ago and the description states they have 30 days to return your money. It seems they are definitely sitting on my money collecting interest until they issue a refund on day 30.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This was a complete waste of money, not at all as described.This cushion set is way too think and small for the price.If you are looking for a thicker and comfortable cushion please look elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent chair pads
reviews.reviewText: I was leery to buy without seeing but these are great quality. The cushions are thick but great for a wooden rocking chair. The color is really nice and these are well sewn. I would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Quality
reviews.reviewText: These cushions are very nice. The fabric is very soft, seem well made, & comfy.Unfortunately, they didn't fit my chair right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I read Some of the reviews and I hoped I didnt regret ordering this. Not sure what the bad reviews are about.. this is good quality, fits perfect and looks great. I wanted Just enough to dress up this chair a little and it is pretty comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as expected
reviews.reviewText: Has a beautiful color and is soft, but is thin and not worth the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are great quality. Fit my chair perfect. Thet are nice and thick. My only complaint is that even though they are thick and are definitely better than sitting on the hard wood they are not real soft. But the quality is great and they look very nice.
Very comfortable looks great as well.
Me gusto el material, le quedo muy bien a mi mecedora. Solo me hubiera gustado que fuera un poquito mas acolchonado, pero la verdad esta muy bonito y comodo.
Excellent achat! Nous adorons son confort

My son and wife are expecting a baby and are going to use my grandmothers very old rocking chair and I felt it needed some padding. The nursery is done in white, grey and mint. The color is a perfect match. The padding is comfortable and they like that the backing has some stickiness to it to keep the cushions in place. Very pleased with the prompt delivery, too. Just as pictured.
Très petit ça fait pas bien
